[[File:Uniqlo SP.jpg|thumb|Key art]]

'''Minecraft x Uniqlo Skin Pack''' was a free skin pack that consisted of 14 skins, promoting the collaboration between ''Minecraft'' and Japanese fashion brand ''{{Wikipedia|Uniqlo}}''<ref>{{mcnet|minecraft-x-uniqlo-collaboration-celebration|Minecraft X Uniqlo Collaboration Celebration|March 2, 2020|Kelsey Howard}}</ref>. At some point, it was delisted.

== Quotes ==
{{Quote|Let’s celebrate the new Minecraft x Uniqlo UT T-Shirt collection with this free Marketplace skin pack! This skin pack features the 7 new t-shirt designs as well as some other fun surprises. Embark on your future adventures in UT style! Minecraft UT Kid’s T-shirts available at Uniqlo stores and online store worldwide starting this Spring.|Minecraft Marketplace description}}
